title: SEASON 7 REWARDS;QUESTION

replies.body:
I hate to necro this thread but i have a question in regards to what ranked qualifies for the Gold + end of season rewards... does Flex queue also receive the rewards??

and also to clearify the question on this thread i think he was asking if he made it to gold in the preseason does he qualify for season 7 rewards... My guess would be no..

As *Zombiemaster* mentioned, your rewards are solely based on what *Ranked Tier* you ended up with yesterday, when the season ended. Nothing in Season 7 Preseason will matter for Season 6 rewards. You can find the breakdown [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230496748)

I hope that clears this up. Let me know if you have any other questions.

Rewards are given based on your rank at the end of a season. So if you end Season 6 (Nov. 7th is the final day) at Gold V, then you will get the Gold V rewards.

What you are during the pre-season or at the start of Season 7 will have no effect on your rewards for Season 6.
